title: 10 year "gift"
body: I came online every day wating for my gift so finally i got it, opened it and got the icon but nothing else cuz i had riot kayle already i thought i would get some kind of mystery gift. PLS help me

replies.body:
We're sending these out to **a ton** of players, which means we have to send them out in waves. Please remain patient while we get these out.

Let me know if you've still not received the gift by the 23rd.
The [gifts ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you)go out one by one and you should have everything by 9/23.
